decks.notes: Utilizing a combination of low-cost goblins and powerful tribal synergies, this deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a fast and aggressive strategy. Key cards like Goblin Chieftain and Kiki-Jiki, Mirror Breaker help to boost the creatures' power and provide additional utility, while cards like Munitions Expert and Sling-Gang Lieutenant offer removal and reach. Aether Vial helps to cheat creatures into play quickly, while the land base ensures consistent mana production for a relentless assault on the opponent.

This deck revolves around quickly casting cheap spells to trigger the prowess ability of creatures like Stormwing Entity and Dragon's Rage Channeler, while also filling up the graveyard to bring back Arclight Phoenix. With a focus on aggressive plays and efficient card draw/filtering, this deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a combination of powerful creatures and burn spells. The inclusion of Demilich and Ox of Agonas provide additional sources of card advantage and graveyard recursion, giving the deck resilience and flexibility in its game plan. Enjoy the fast-paced and dynamic gameplay of this Modern aggro deck!
